content: <rss version="2.0" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"> <channel> <title>Monsanto Fund</title> <atom:link href="http://www.monsantofund.org/rss/latest-headlines/" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" /> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org</link> <description>Latest Headlines</description> <language>en-us</language> <copyright>Copyright \ufffd\ufffd2015 Monsanto Fund</copyright> <image> <url>http://www.monsantofund.org/_images/rss-logo-mon-fund.png</url> <title>MonsantoFund.org</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org</link> <width>216</width> <height>80</height> </image> <item> <title>Farming Communities Receive $150k Funding Boost</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2015/australia-farming-communities-receive-funding-boost.asp</link> <description>Thirty community initiatives in cotton-growing towns across Queensland and New South Wales have been awarded a total of $150,000 in grants by the Monsanto Fund in partnership with the Foundation for Rural and Regional Renewal (FRRR). After receiving more than 150 nominations for the Aussie Cotton Farmers Grow Communities program, FRRR has selected 30 nominations made by cotton farmers...</description> <pubDate>2015-02-17T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2015/australia-farming-communities-receive-funding-boost.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>Monsanto Fund Sustaining Grant For St. Louis Symphony In Unison\ufffd\ufffd Chorus </title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/sustaining-grant-for-st-louis-symphony-in-unison-chorus.asp</link> <description>As the St. Louis Symphony IN UNISON Chorus prepares for its sold-out Gospel Christmas performance at Powell Hall, the Monsanto Fund announces a $160,000 sustaining grant for the program.   IN UNISON provides music resources to predominantly African-American churches in the St. Louis area.  The program reaches more than 20,000 people from more than 40 churches...</description> <pubDate>2014-12-16T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/sustaining-grant-for-st-louis-symphony-in-unison-chorus.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>Aussie Cotton communities set to receive $150,000 in grants</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/cotton-communities-grants.asp</link> <description>Cotton growers across NSW and QLD have the opportunity to direct philanthropic investment to their local community groups, thanks to a new initiative from the Monsanto Fund in partnership with the Foundation for Rural & Regional Renewal (FRRR).</description> <pubDate>2014-07-28T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/cotton-communities-grants.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>YMCA\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Science Gone Mad Expo Recognizes Students Accomplishments, Drives STEM Education</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/ymca-science-gone-mad-expo.asp</link> <description>The YMCA Community Literacy program hosted its inaugural Science Gone Mad Expo on Saturday at the Historic Carondelet YMCA. The Expo highlighted the work and achievements of more than 70 Science Gone Mad students by sharing exciting science, technology, engineering and mathematics (STEM) demonstrations. </description> <pubDate>2014-05-21T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/ymca-science-gone-mad-expo.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>Monsanto Fund Grant Provides Tools that Helped Ohio School District Improve Graduation Test Scores by 20 Percent</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/grant-provides-tool-to-help-improve-test-scores.asp</link> <description>Graduation test scores improved in 2013 for students at Ridgedale School District in Ohio through updated educational materials. During the 2012-2013 school year, teachers were able to supplement their traditional classroom approaches, thanks to technology purchased with a $10,000 grant awarded in 2012. </description> <pubDate>2014-04-17T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/grant-provides-tool-to-help-improve-test-scores.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>America\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Farmers Grow Rural Education Grants Provide Learning Opportunities for Students in Illinois</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/grants-provide-opportunities-for-illinois-students.asp</link> <description>Olympia CUSD 16 now has a modern greenhouse that provides hands-on learning opportunities for students at the local high school.  Based on a strong grant application and the support of local Illinois farmers, the Olympia CUSD 16 received a $10,000 grant from America\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Farmers Grow Rural Education this past fall. </description> <pubDate>2014-04-15T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/grants-provide-opportunities-for-illinois-students.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>Monsanto Fund Grants Help Students in Western Nebraska Acquire Knowledge through Applied Math and Science</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/western-nebraska-students-applied-math-and-science.asp</link> <description>The benefits of technology in the classroom are well-established. Students are more engaged, and more excited about learning when schools incorporate technology with the curriculum. According to the U.S. Department of Education, technology is now considered by most educators and parents to be an integral part of providing a high-quality education.</description> <pubDate>2014-04-11T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/western-nebraska-students-applied-math-and-science.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>Northwest Iowa School Districts Implement Applied Math and Science Courses with $50,000 in Grants</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/northwest-iowa-schools-math-and-science.asp</link> <description>Hands-on activities nurture a love of learning and connect abstract concepts to the real world, while achieving desired educational outcomes, according to Resource Area for Teaching (RAFT). The Boyden-Hull Community and West Lyon Community School Districts have been able to provide tools to give students real-life experience with complex concepts in math and science, with...</description> <pubDate>2014-04-08T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/northwest-iowa-schools-math-and-science.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>South Central Wisconsin Schools Utilize $35,000 in Grants to Cultivate Learning</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/wisconsin-schools-cultivate-learning.asp</link> <description>In South Central Wisconsin, farmer contributions reach past the dinner table and into the classroom. In 2013, Wisconsin farmers nominated the Oregon School District and the Waupun Area School District for math and science grants through America\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Farmers Grow Rural Education, sponsored by the Monsanto Fund. The results of this support are evident throughout both districts...</description> <pubDate>2014-04-03T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/wisconsin-schools-cultivate-learning.asp</guid> </item> <item> <title>Kansas School Districts Implement $45,000 in Grants for Greenhouses and Outdoor Classrooms</title> <link>http://www.monsantofund.org/about/newsroom/2014/kansas-greenhouse-outdoor-classrooms.asp</link> <description>Rural school districts in Kansas are digging into math and science education by taking the classroom outdoors and into the garden. One way districts are growing interest among students is by building greenhouses that provide hands-on learning opportunities. In Kansas, Southern Lyon County School District, Grinnell Public Schools, and North Jackson USD 335 initiated...</description> <pubDate>2014-04-01T06:00:00Z</pubDate> <guid>/about/newsroom/2014/kansas-greenhouse-outdoor-classrooms.asp</guid> </item> </channel> </rss>
